title: Bakugan Battle Arena with Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid, Customizable, Spinning Action Figure and Playset, Kids Toys for Boys and Girls 6 and up
descriptions:
Bakugan Battle Arena with Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid

Get the battles started right out of the box! This deluxe Bakugan Battle Arena is a great starter set for kids 6 and up and comes with an exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid you can only get here. The arena is sturdy and customizable, so you can set it up how you like, add flags, and use the included sparring totems to practice shots and tricks.

What we like about it:
- Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid with a spinning attack feature. It uses the included XL rip cord for awesome launches and smooth spins.
- Built-in phone holder on the arena, handy if you want to watch how-to videos or keep the Roblox game open while you play.
- Multi-part ball linking system so you can customize and upgrade your Bakugan as you collect more. Compatible with training sets (sold separately) for even more ways to play.
- Roll-and-display base and Gate Cards that trigger transformations when your Bakugan lands on them.
- Includes a special online game code with Roblox compatibility for extra fun beyond the tabletop.

What’s in the box:
- 1 Deluxe Arena
- 1 Special Attack Bakugan (Dragonoid)
- 2 Clan Flags
- 3 Sparring Totems
- 1 Character Card
- 1 Special Attack Card
- 2 Gate Cards
- 1 XL Rip Cord
- 1 Bakugan Token

This is an official Bakugan product and covered by the Spin Master Care Commitment. It’s collectible, easy to set up, and a fun way for boys and girls to jump into Bakugan battles, practice skills, and expand with Battle Packs and training sets as they go. Great gift idea for birthdays or holidays. Condition is new and unopened. Ships fast from a smoke-free home.
